title: KAN-79 User registration (GET/POST)
description: User can open /register; submit name, email, password, address, contact, pin; duplicate email redirects to login; successful registration redirects to /login.
acceptanceCriteria: Form accepts name, email, password, address, contact, pin

title: KAN-80 User login (GET/POST)
description: User can open /login; submit email and password; invalid credentials show error; valid consumer redirects to img (home); valid admin (role 1) redirects to /admin/dashboard.

title: KAN-81 Root redirect to login
description: Visiting / redirects to /login.

title: KAN-82 E-commerce product listing
description: Authenticated user with userid can open /ecommerce?userid=... and see all products and username.
acceptanceCriteria: Page loads with userid query param

title: KAN-83 Product detail page
description: User can open /displayproduct with userid, producerid, productid and see product details, producer info, and user context.
acceptanceCriteria: Product details displayed for given productid

title: KAN-84 Add product to cart
description: From catalog, user can add a product via /add-to-cart (with id, userid, productName, producerid, producername, productCost, imgUrl); existing item increments quantity; redirects to /ecommerce?userid=....
acceptanceCriteria: Add to cart with required query params

title: KAN-85 Product search
description: User can search by product name via /search?productName=... and see matching products on e-commerce view.
acceptanceCriteria: Matching products displayed on e-commerce view

title: KAN-86 Product categories filter
description: User can filter by category/name via /categories?productName=... and see filtered products on e-commerce view.
acceptanceCriteria: Filtered products displayed on e-commerce view

title: KAN-87 Producer product page
description: User can open /producer with userid, producerid, productid and see producer info, selected product, and other products by that producer.
acceptanceCriteria: Producer info and selected product displayed
Other products by same producer shown

title: KAN-88 Check ID / add product gate
description: User can open /checkid?userid=...; if Itemproduced === 0 see register link view; else see add-new-product-user view.

title: KAN-89 View cart
description: User can open /cart?userid=... and see all cart items (status InCart) for that user.
acceptanceCriteria: Cart page shows all InCart items for userid

title: KAN-90 Remove single item from cart
description: User can remove one item via /remove-from-cart?id=...; cart is updated and user is redirected to /cart.

title: KAN-91 Clear entire cart
description: User can clear all cart items via /removeall?userid=...; redirects to /cart.
acceptanceCriteria: All InCart items removed for userid

title: KAN-92 Update cart item quantity/price
description: User can update quantity and price via /updatepricecount?id=...&count=...&price=...; cart is updated and user is redirected to /cart.
acceptanceCriteria: Quantity and price updated by id

title: KAN-93 Checkout (place order)
description: User can checkout via /checkout?id=... (user id); all that user's InCart items are set to Ordered; user is redirected to /thankyou.
acceptanceCriteria: All InCart items set to Ordered for user

title: KAN-94 Thank you page
description: After checkout, user can see /thankyou confirmation page.

title: KAN-95 Admin dashboard
description: Admin can open /admin/dashboard and see ordered items, in-cart items, customers, and product likes (sorted); high likes (≥3) create producer notifications.
acceptanceCriteria: Ordered, InCart, customers, product likes displayed
Product likes sorted; ≥3 likes create producer notification

title: KAN-96 Admin – add new product (form)
description: Admin can open /admin/addnewproduct and see the add-product form.
acceptanceCriteria: Add new product form is displayed

title: KAN-97 Admin – create product
description: Admin can POST to /admin/addproduct with name, imgUrl, price, quantity; product is created in catalog and add-new-product view is shown again.

title: KAN-98 Admin – list all products
description: Admin can open /admin/products and see all catalog products.

title: KAN-99 Admin – update product (form)
description: Admin can open /admin/update with id, name, price, imgUrl, quantity and see the update form pre-filled.
acceptanceCriteria: Update form pre-filled with product data

title: KAN-100 Admin – update product (submit)
description: Admin can POST to /admin/updateproduct with id, name, price, imgUrl, quantity; catalog is updated and user is redirected to /admin/products.

title: KAN-101 Admin – delete product (list)
description: Admin can open /admin/delete and see list of products with delete option.
acceptanceCriteria: Product list with delete option displayed

title: KAN-102 Admin – delete single product
description: Admin can delete one product via /admin/deleteproduct?id=...; product is removed and user is redirected to /admin/delete.

title: KAN-103 Admin – remove product (from dashboard)
description: Admin can remove a product via /admin/remove?id=...; product is deleted and user is redirected to /admin/dashboard.

title: KAN-104 Admin – customers list
description: Admin can open /admin/customers and see all registered users.

title: KAN-105 Admin – total orders view
description: Admin can open /admin/total-orders and see per-user counts of ordered items, in-cart items, and total.
acceptanceCriteria: Per-user ordered, in-cart, and total counts displayed

title: KAN-106 Admin – orders detail view
description: Admin can open /admin/orders and see per-user list of ordered products.

title: KAN-107 Admin – favourites (wishlist) view
description: Admin can open /admin/favourites and see all users with their liked/wishlist products.
acceptanceCriteria: All users with liked products displayed

title: KAN-108 User dashboard
description: User can open /user/dashboard?userid=... and see user info and their ordered items.
acceptanceCriteria: User info and ordered items displayed

title: KAN-109 User orders list
description: User can open /user/orders?userid=... and see their ordered products.

title: KAN-110 User – add product (producer) entry
description: User can open /user/addproduct?userid=...; if Itemproduced is 0, see register-link view; else see add-new-product-user view.

title: KAN-111 User – producer stats (product stats)
description: Producer can open /user/producer?userid=... and see order stats and like stats per product (resultArray, likedResultArray).
acceptanceCriteria: Order and like stats per product displayed

title: KAN-112 User appointments view
description: User can open /user/appointments?userid=... and see their appointments (as consumer and as producer) with formatted dates.
acceptanceCriteria: Appointments as consumer and producer with formatted dates displayed

title: KAN-113 Address page
description: User can open /address and see the address view.

title: KAN-114 Schedule appointment
description: User can POST to /schedule-appointment with userId, producerId, productId, appointmentDate, appointmentTime, appointmentText; appointment is created with producer/consumer names and user is redirected back to producer page.
acceptanceCriteria: Redirect to producer page with query params

title: KAN-115 Appointment completion cron job
description: A daily cron (e.g. 11:53) marks appointments as completed when appointmentDate is in the past (completed 0 → 1).
acceptanceCriteria: Past appointments marked completed by cron

title: KAN-116 Producer notifications
description: Producer can open /producer/notifications?userid=... and see their notifications (e.g. likes achieved).

title: KAN-117 Producer registration (KYC)
description: User can POST to /registerproducer with userid, aadharno, panno, documentid, taxid; producer record is created with generated assignedid and user is redirected to /completekyc?userid=....

title: KAN-118 Update item produced flag
description: Request to /producer/updateitemproduced?userid=... sets user's Itemproduced to 1 and shows add-new-product-user view.

title: KAN-119 Add to wishlist
description: User can add product via /addtowishlist (userid, productName, producerid, producername, productCost, imgUrl); duplicate is no-op; redirects to /ecommerce?userid=....

title: KAN-120 Remove from wishlist
description: User can remove item via /removefromwishlist?id=...&userid=...; redirects to /wishlist?userid=....

title: KAN-121 View wishlist
description: User can open /wishlist?userid=... and see all wishlist items for that user.
acceptanceCriteria: All wishlist items for userid displayed

title: KAN-122 Location page
description: User can open /location and see the location view.

title: KAN-123 Seed product catalog from static data
description: On server start, products from backend/data/all_products.js are mapped (producerID→producerid, imgURL→imgUrl, etc.) and inserted into AllProduct collection only when a product with same name does not already exist.
acceptanceCriteria: Products inserted only if name not exists
